codeSystems.name: USCoreCDARoleCode
codeSystems.title: USCore CCDA Role Code
codeSystems.description: **FHIR Version R4 Copy of FHIR Version R5 [CDARoleCode](http://hl7.org/cda/stds/core/ValueSet/CDARoleCode).** A set of codes further specifying the kind of Role; specific classification codes for further qualifying RoleClass codes.

codeSystems.name: USCoreClinicalNoteType
codeSystems.title: US Core Clinical Note Type
codeSystems.description: The US Core Clinical Note Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of types supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.
